timeline.message: Move quota-aware-fs plugin under x-pack/ and mark it licensed
Prompt to accept license when installing licensed plugin
Always print something in batch mode, make everything more testable
Change license check to just abort on non-default distros
Only run QuotaAwareFsTests on default distro

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason this method couldn't exist within InstallPluginCommand?
timeline.author: rjernst
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: There used to be more code involved here, which is why I split it out, but as you rightly point out it's just short-ish method now. I've folded it back into the installer class.
replies.author: pugnascotia
